title: Neethana Neethana Lyrics Unnai Thedi
stanzas:
Neethaanaa neethaana
en anbae neethaanaa
naanthaanaa paarthaena
en kannil neethaanaa(2)

en vaasal vandhadhu neethaana
enai thirudi sendradhu neethaana
en manadhai thindradhu neethaana
en kadhal kavidhai neethaana
en uyirai thottadhu neethaana
naane neethaanaa.

Neethaanaa neethaana
en anbae neethaanaa
naanthaanaa paarthaena
en kannil neethaanaa

ennil iruppadhu neethaana
en nenjil midhapathu neethaana
enai alli kudippathu neethaana
neeethaana neethaanaa

vetkam thanthadhu neethaana
en kanna sivappile neethaana
en udhattil inippadhum neethaana
neethaana neethaanaa

en kadhal haikoo neethaana
ada ennai padithadhu neethaana
naan kavidhai ezhutha
katru thandha
dhevathai neethaanaa

Neethaanaa neethaana
en anbae neethaanaa
naanthaanaa paarthaena
en kannil neethaanaa

kulirai virattum thee neethaana
theeyai anaikkum neer neethaana
en uyiril neendhuvadhum neethaana
neethaanaa neethaanaa

nilavin nizhazhumadi neethaana
kan simittum silaiyumadi neethaana
en sirikkum malarum adi neethaana
neethaanaa neethaanaa

en selai nuniyil neethaanaa
oru thoondil pottadhu neethaana
enai paithiyam pola thaniye
sirikka vaithathum neethaanaa

Neethaanaa neethaana
en anbae neethaanaa
naanthaanaa paarthaena
en kannil neethaanaa

en vaasal vandhadhu neethaana
enai thirudi sendradhu neethaana
en manadhai thindradhu neethaana
en kadhal kavidhai neethaana
en uyirai thottadhu neethaana
naane neethaanaa.
